data.description: Module which does SSN validation on AAAA-GG
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Started as just something I needed, which didn't seem to already
    have a module for. I made it a while ago, and based on emails I get,
    people are using it. I'd also like to have more in the SSN
    namespace, such as SSN::SSDI for the Social Security Death Index.
    SSN was my obvious choice, since it deals with Social Security
    numbers.
